name: Happy end
description:
This is our contribution to Trijam#94 ("a+b=c")

The game is about combining the starting elements of the book to achieve a Happy End. 

Not a great challenge, but let's say it's a chill game, we hope will make you smile for 2 minutes.

We are a team of 2. This was our first trijam experience. Time really ran fast! We feel a little frustrated as we wanted to do much more, especially a few more stories, now the frame is done. 

We also had to take more time than 3h, just to deliver an acceptable version:

  • Pierre for development on Unity: 3h54
  • Vincent for graphics and audio on PSP: 1h50

All used assets were produced in this time limit.

(By the way, audios are not 100% professional)

Next time we'll do better!
